can.fact: Aluminum cans are 100% recyclable and can be reused forever!

glass.fact: Glass is endlessly recyclable without losing quality.

plastic.fact: Plastic takes hundreds of years to break down and pollutes oceans.

plastic_bag.fact: Plastic bags are hard to recycle and often harm wildlife.

styrofoam.fact: Styrofoam is not biodegradable and is very harmful to the environment.
